definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun referring to Adele Laurie Blue Adkins, a British singer-songwriter renowned for her powerful mezzo-soprano voice, emotionally resonant lyrics, and global chart-topping albums such as '19', '21', and '25'.
definitions.explanation_cn: 专有名词，指英国歌手兼词曲作者阿黛尔·劳丽·布鲁·阿德金斯，以其强大的中音女声、情感真挚的歌词以及全球畅销专辑《19》《21》和《25》而闻名。
definitions.example_en: Adele won multiple Grammy Awards for her album '21', which became one of the best-selling albums of the 21st century.
definitions.example_cn: 阿黛尔凭借专辑《21》赢得了多项格莱美奖，这张专辑成为21世纪最畅销的专辑之一。
